(as a prefix to verbs, especially of motion, and their derivatives) near, near to, towards (See A-kram &c ; in the Vedaveda, of course, the prefix is separable from the verb ; in a few cases RV. i, 10, 11 and v, 64, 5, a verb in the imperative is to be supplied ; with roots like gam, yA, and i, to go , and 1. dA, to give , it reverses the action ; e.g. A-gacCati, he comes ; A-datte, he takes ). (as a conjunctive particle) moreover, further, and (it is placed either between the two words connected [rarely after the second RV. x, 16, 11, or after both RV. x, 92, 8] or, if there are more, after the last [RV. iv, 57, 1 and x, 75, 5] ; , see also AtaS ca s.v.)
